item.description:
Maxwell-Silverman?s Toolhouse
Club Maxine?s
Lincoln Square, Worcester MA
(508) 755-1200
Fax (508) 753-8217
Email: info@maxwellmaxine.com


Four Star Dining















10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.
OPEN TO THE PUBLIC
COMPLIMENTARY MIMOSA OR BLOODY MARY


Sunday Brunch at Maxine?s is a delightful and unforgettable experience for the entire family. Our talented chefs prepare an outstanding variety of versatile cuisine. Seven entrees are accented by our omelet station, assorted fruits and juices, a carving and desert station.
Private rooms available for Bridal brunches, Anniversaries
and Showers.


Breakfast Items:
Fresh juices

Eggs benedict

Scrambled eggs

Sausage and bacon

Fresh made waffles

Salmon display

Fresh fruit and cheeses

Assorted cereals

Omelet Station:
Omelets made to order

Salad Station:
Caesar, tossed, spinach

four specialty salads

Assorted Breads:
Danish, muffins
bagels and rolls

Carving Station:
Hand carved roast beef and roast turkey

Entree Station:
Chicken, beef, veal, or seafood with potato and fresh vegetables.

Dessert Station:
Assorted pastries, pies, cakes, and moussem Ice cream with toppings for sundaes or cones,

Coffe or tea included
















Questions? Send us an Email!
info@maxwellmaxine.com
item.name: Sunday Brunch
